items.text: good length, slides in to find the inside edge and hit the back pad
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chandimal, no run

items.text: short of a length, opens the face to third man
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Tharanga, 1 run

items.text: full and angling in, clipped off the pads to midwicket
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Chandimal, no run

items.text: short of a length, flicked off the pads behind the square leg umpire
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Chandimal, 1 run

items.text: full, slower at 118.5kph and pushed across, driven wide of the long-off fielder
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Tharanga, 1 run

items.text: back of a length, cuts in towards off, defended back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Chandimal, no run

items.text: full outside off, drilled off the splice to the bowler
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Chandimal, no run

items.text: short of a length on middle, backs away and mistimes a cut to point
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Tharanga, no run

items.text: full on middle, flicked to midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Tharanga, no run

items.text: dropped. Advances down the ground and chips an inside-out drive to cover. The fielder gets up with both hands outstretched but the ball grazes the fingers and gets past him
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Tharanga, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, beat front-foot defense into the off side
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chandimal, no run

items.text: good length on middle and off, defended off the front foot
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chandimal, no run

items.text: advances down the ground and drives a fuller one to long-off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chandimal, 1 run

items.preText:
Here comes Rubel

Anuruddha : "Tharanga is reaching to the Century.. Oohh not runs but balls..." Still doing a job, I reckon. As long as he doesn't get out now.
items.text: extremely full, almost a yorker, swings in on leg, clipped to mid-on
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Chandimal, no run

items.text: good length outside off, leans forward into a punch to covers
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Chandimal, no run

items.text: rolls the fingers for the cutter outside off but floats up a full toss that's driven out to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Chandimal, 1 run

items.preText: Samsha: "What's a par score here? 240-250? Doesn't seem like an easy surface to bat on." Yup, that should be good.
items.text: back of a length, cross-seamer, keeps low and Tharanga fails to adjust as he gets beaten
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Tharanga, no run

items.text: good length on off, drops into the point region with an open face
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Tharanga, no run

items.text: chipped in the air but safe. A slower ball that stops on him a little, closes the face and skews it off the splice. Midwicket runs forward and the ball drops short
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Tharanga, 1 run

items.text: good length, spins in, rocks back and flays a pull to the right of deep midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Tharanga, 1 run

items.text: good length on off, punched into the covers
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chandimal, no run

items.text: full, pushes early and uppishly knocks it to cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chandimal, no run

items.text: full on middle, defends to point. Tharanga sets off for a single but is sent back
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chandimal, no run

items.text: short, not much room and keeps low, chops a cut to point
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chandimal, no run

items.text: good length on middle, punched solidly to mid-off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chandimal, no run
